Original:
珍惜生命，遠離A light!

無酒單，店員還不會介紹，一直推銷大家先來一杯低酒精漱口，即便已經拒絕了還一直狂推銷。我們想點酒精濃度比較高的調酒，店員還一直囉嗦說這個酒精濃度比較高，要我們點酒精濃度低的，煩死！我們都已經表達了只想要點一杯還一直跳針是怎樣！

我們也表達想要點不一樣的酒，店員還說你們這樣要等很久喔，要點一樣的酒才快！（明明當時店裡才5, 6個客人）。我們回說想要喝不同的酒，比較有趣，店員又說：不會啊，也是有客人來開一瓶紅酒大家一起喝！！！真心不懂這家店到底是怎麼一回事請到這樣的店員？？？

我們觀察別桌點什麼酒，發現非常有趣的現象，居然連續兩桌四人以上的桌都點一模一樣的酒，紫蘇調酒！試想要有多低的機率可以達成這樣的現象！店員到底要能多不會推薦才能解鎖這樣的成就！

結論：不要浪費你的生命跟金錢好嗎？台北還有很多酒吧比這間好！A light不好玩，裝潢普通，酒普通，店員超瞎！
EN:
Cherish life and stay away from A Light!

There is no wine list, and the clerk will not introduce it. I have been selling a cup of low alcohol and mouthwash, even if they have rejected, they have been selling madly.We want to order the alcohol with a high concentration of alcohol. The clerk also said that the concentration of this wine is relatively high. We need to order the concentration of the alcohol, which is boring!We have all expressed what to just want to order a cup and what happened!

We also expressed that they want to order different wines. The clerk also said that you have to wait a long time.(Obviously only 5, 6 guests in the store at that time).We said that if you want to drink different wines, it is more interesting. The clerk also said: No, there are guests to open a bottle of red wine for everyone to drink together!IntersectionIntersectionI really do n’t understand what this shop is going to come to such a clerk?IntersectionIntersection

We observe what wine is ordered, and find very interesting phenomena. Actually, more than two tables and more tables in a row are the same.Try how low you want to reach this phenomenon!In the end, the clerk must not be recommended to unlock such achievements!

Conclusion: Don't waste your life and money?There are many bars in Taipei better than this!A light is not fun, decorated, ordinary wine, and the clerk is super blind!

Original:
稱無酒單還一直推銷批發調酒？
（請看Ching Chi  1顆星評論 寫太好了）

太晚看到Ching chi 的評論了，遺憾又發生了

0）店員一樣強調我們是沒酒單
1）點酒體驗差 -
也不能從基底給建議（我想威士忌底的也推薦不出來）也不行從經典調酒提供推薦，只問你喜歡甜的還是酸的？？？ 我最後點了所謂比較tropical 的酒

2）強推「批發」調酒 -
好不容易已經點完上述調酒了，隔2分鐘還是跑來問要不要嘗試紫蘇調酒比較快上，我們還是被推銷了紫蘇。 以為是第一杯要改成紫蘇調酒，結過原本點的較tropical 調酒一樣同時間製作，還緊接紫蘇調酒不久後跟著上。 還上錯！！ 點tropical 給我old fashion?? 溝通非常非常非常的差

3）同店員客氣的嗆：「你們知道這是誰開的店嗎？注意一點」
我們坐在沙發區，與吧台區有約5公尺寬的走道，店員竟然特地來請我們不要影響到走道，請我們不要用有靠背的椅影響走道，用板凳往沙發區坐。管完秩序就算了，隔一下還來嗆「你們知道這是誰開的店嗎？你們注意一點」

酒真的普通。不知道是無酒單還是忘記印酒單。有的話大概也只會有紫蘇、接骨木…吧。沒能力介紹無酒單，就不要一直強推批發的調酒。很便宜行事。Cheap ！

我「最親愛的」老闆， 這間店我下次再提起就是連名帶姓，謊稱無酒單卻是疏遠的可以～

你的員工就代表你
EN:
Said that there is no wine list and has been selling for wholesale and bartending?
(Please see Ching Chi 1 star comment is so good)

Seeing Ching Chi's comments too late, regrettable happened again

0) The clerk also emphasizes that we have no wine list
1) Poor wine experience-
It is not possible to provide recommendations from the base (I think the whiskey bottom can not be recommended) or it can not be recommended from the classic bartender. I just ask if you like sweet or sour?IntersectionIntersectionI finally ordered the so -called tropical wine

2) Strong push "wholesale" bartender-
After finally ordering the above -mentioned bartending, I still came to ask if I wanted to try the purple sake of alcohol, and we were still promoted.I thought it was the first cup to be changed to perilla mixing. The original point was made as time than Tropical bartending, and it was followed by Periste's alcohol.Also wrong!IntersectionClick Tropical to give me Old Fashion ?? communication is very, very very poor

3) The same as the clerk was polite: "Do you know who opened the shop? Pay attention"
We sat in the sofa area and had about 5 meters wide aisle with the bar area. The clerk came to ask us not to influence the aisle. We should not use a chair with a back to affect the walkway and sit on the sofa area with a bench.After finishing the order, let's take a look at "Who do you know who opened this store? Pay attention"

The wine is really ordinary.I don't know if there is no wine list or forgot to print the wine list.If you have any, there will be only purple Soviets, bone wood ...If you are not able to introduce no wine list, don't keep pushing for wholesale.Very cheap.Cheap!

My "dearest" boss, I will mention this shop next time I will bring the name with the surname, but lies that the wineless list is alienated ~

Your employee represents you
